CustomField.description: Each event created. per trigger may result in DML being performed that causes the same trigger being fired. This is called a recursion. This field defines the maximum number of recursions that are allowed. Set the value to 0 for unlimited recursions.

CustomField.label: Maximum Recursive Depth
